title: Steal from other games
body:
Riot please steal features from other games. I would love to see in lol...

Cs go overwatch
let good skilled players high ranked watch a random 10-15 mins of a game and put their vote towards a ban. I have overwatch and man its refreshing knowing you helped ban someone. 

Dota 2 coach/mentor
Ok I haven't tried this but from what I hear good players can coach lower skilled players via voice and drawing on their screen... this sounds cool

There was something else but just had a brain fart and it's gone
